mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(noticeNum,userId, title, important, content ) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL,#{userId},#{title},#{important},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT noticeNum , important , n.userId ,title,content,hitcount, TO_CHAR(created, 'YYYY-MM-DD') created FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId WHERE important = 1 ORDER BY noticeNum DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET hitcount=hitcount+1 WHERE noticeNum = #{noticeNum}
mapper.select:
SELECT tb.* FROM( SELECT noticeNum , title FROM notice n JOIN member1 m ON n.userId=m.userId
AND (noticeNum > #{noticeNum})
ORDER BY noticeNum ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
